author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Quartz curb top tips…I’m using a 1/2-inch by 1/2-inch u-shaped trowel from @Perfectlevelmaster  both on the quartz and the Schluter curb. I compress the quartz top into the mortar, make it level across the length, and pitch it slightly toward the shower. This piece of quartz is 3 cm thick and about 47 inches long 🔥 #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Quartz Curb Top Tips - #shorts #showerremodel #homerepairtutor
